title: Call stacks for messages
body:
This feature would add a (expandable) view of the call stack associated with a console message (where applicable e.g. console.log) with each frame being a hyperlink to the relevant source location.

Proposed Design
- Expando after the current source location string (Default collapsed)
- When expanded each frame would be shown as a new line (in order) underneath the source location (which is the top frame)

comments.body: More details about issues related to displaying stack traces in current Edge DevTools at https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/10868717/ (see the screenshots).

Note that Chrome, Safari & Firefox all print errors with stack traces immediately visible, without the need to expand anything manually. Hiding the stack makes it harder for developers to react to errors.
